title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming FinServ AI DLC with Kiro Agentic IDE (DEV203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 智能体 IDE 转型金融服务 AI DLC (DEV203)
abstract: Discover how Kiro Agentic IDE revolutionizes financial services application development through intelligent code generation, automated compliance checks, and context-aware suggestions. This session shares real-world implementation experiences, productivity gains achieved, and lessons learned while building secure, regulated financial applications. Learn practical strategies for integrating AI-powered development tools into traditional FinServ workflows, overcoming regulatory challenges, and measuring developer productivity improvements in highly regulated environments.
abstract_cn: 了解 Kiro Agentic IDE 如何通过智能代码生成、自动化合规检查和上下文感知建议彻底改变金融服务应用程序开发。本次会议分享真实的实施经验、取得的生产力提升，以及在构建安全、受监管的金融应用程序时获得的经验教训。学习将 AI 驱动的开发工具集成到传统金融服务工作流程中的实用策略，克服监管挑战，并在高度监管的环境中衡量开发人员生产力的提升。
